title: Bill and Ben flower pot men
brief_description: Bill and Ben, the flower pot men, and their friend Weed get involved in four fun adventures. Bill and Ben form their own band using vegetables as instruments in “Musical vegetables.” Bill and Ben find a new friend in “Scarecrow”, a pair of boots leds them on a merry dance in “Flying boots” and Bill and Ben have lots of winter fun in Icicles.
